resources.string: Your service provider does not support disabling call forwarding when your phone is busy.
"Your service provider does not support disabling call forwarding when your phone doesn't answer."
No voicemail number is saved on the SIM card.
You cannot make outgoing calls while call blocking is on.
Turn off airplane mode to place a call
Could not add/edit fixed dialing contact. Check PIN2 or SIM card storage capacity.
Note that microphone noise suppression works only when you talk directly in the phone, not when you use the speaker or a headset.
PUK2 locked. Contact service provider to unlock.
Could not delete fixed dialing contact
"I'm on another phone call. I'll call you back later."
"I'm busy. I'll call you back later."
"I'm on another phone call. I'll call you back later."
"I'm in a meeting. I'll call you back later."
"I'm driving. I'll call you back later."
"I'm eating. I'll call you back later."

"Answering Machine differs from the voicemail service provided by your operator. This feature picks up incoming calls for you, plays your specified greeting, and records callers' messages on your Xperia™.
*Answering Machine is unavailable when the device is in airplane mode or out of network coverage. *At least one greeting must be recorded before use."

"Answering Machine differs from the voicemail service provided by your operator. This feature picks up incoming calls for you, plays your specified greeting, and records callers' messages on your Xperia™.
*Answering Machine is unavailable when the device is in airplane mode or out of network coverage."
Depending on the ring time you specify here, your voicemail may pick up incoming calls before Answering Machine.
Please be aware that using Answering Machine abroad may result in substantial roaming charges.
Use Answering Machine when traveling abroad
You have a missed call. Do you know that there is a built-in Answering Machine in your Xperia™? Tap here to enable it.
